lines: Finally free !
I was waiting so long for a body to come in this place...
Thanks for saving me young ma...
Oh no ! I did not pay attention ! You are not a mage, neither a human...
You are a... dice ? What a dice is doing here ?
Oh I did not present myself. I'm Bloopy, a crystal spirit.
I do not have any memories, the only thing I know is...
...my role was to assist young mage in their process of learning magic.
It's been a long time I did not see any forms of life.
But you are here... If I succeeded to attach myself to you, it means you have soul.
How is it possible ? What happened to you ?
Well... I don't known myself what happened to me.
For now, we need to leave this place to gather some informations.
It seems you can't do anything without me.
I can only make you move for now but if you find some energy, maybe I can do something more.
On the other hand, I can't help you on the control. Every soul has his own way.
You'll have to figure it out.
If I run out of energy, we go bust.
Let's do it !
Now you can move ! I hope you know how to roll because I don't.
Oh crap ! Some rocks are falling from the top !
This place seems really dangerous but do not worry.
My energy serves as a barrier too.
If you get hurt, you'll loose some energy instead of being crushed.
Still try not to spend too much energy, or we will never get out of here.
Oh ! Watch ! An active blue crystal !
I can get some energy !
Come closer and touch it !
It feels so good !
With that additional energy, I can make you levitate now !
Cool, nah ?
